improving.name: improving
improving.description: Starts negative, becomes neutral, finishes positive â€” tests trend detection (Improving).

meta.notes: Later positive messages should push overall sentiment positive using recency or neutral with mean.

messages: I'm really disappointed with how things are going.
It's not as bad as yesterday though.
Actually, I think things might work out.
Thanks for helping me figure this out!

sarcasm.name: sarcasm
sarcasm.description: Contains sarcastic sentences that commonly trip up sentiment models.

meta.notes: Many models may classify sarcastic lines as positive; this tests robustness and whether you added sarcasm heuristics.

messages: Wow, great... this totally didn't waste my entire day.
Oh perfect, another unexpected error. Good job!
Sure, I love it when things break at 3 AM.
